column2: IDEA-112775 git file history  make use of git describe command

column3: IDEA-112775 git file history  make use of git describe command

evra, thank you for the contribution! However, adding a special column for the tag doesn't seem a good decision to me. I'd rather display this information in the commit details, and also request this asynchronously.

We plan to reuse the Log tab UI & internals to display file history in Git and Mercurial. There we'll also be able to calculate the last containing tag very quickly. Please stay turned with https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-134580 and https://youtrack.jetbrains.com/issue/IDEA-98963.
IDEA-112775 git file history make use of git describe command
